Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
PREP
1. (PReP) {PowerPC Reference Platform}.
2. (PREP) PRogrammed Electronics Patterns. Language for designing {integrated circuit}s. ["Computer Assisted Mask Production", R.L. Rosenfeld, Proc IEEE 57(9) Sep 1969].

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: prep n : preparatory school work done outside school (especially at home) [syn: {homework}, {preparation}]
